songs.title: Infatuation
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I met you in a dream
And your piercing eyes were staring straight at me
I can't believe this feeling
You make me feel so much
I want you always near me
Is this really what it seems?

[Pre-Chorus]
What you, what you're feeling
Let me know it immediately
And surely, surely I will
Understand you (more and more)
I'm beginning to get confused (more and more)
It's, it's suffocating (more and more)
Come on here

[Chorus]
I need you
I want you
I got to have you
It's infatuation

[Verse 2]
Love, I've finally found a new
And it came to me inside your vision
Now I know I need you so
You make me feel like crazy
I really feel you, baby
I see an angel in your eyes
Yeah

[Pre-Chorus]
What you, what you're feeling
Let me know it immediately
And surely, surely I will
Understand you (more and more)
I'm beginning to get confused (more and more)
It's, it's suffocating (more and more)
Come on here

[Chorus]
I need you
I want you
I got to have you
It's infatuation

[Bridge]
If fire falls down from the sky
If all the rivers should run dry
If false turns out to be true
You know that I will find you
Because our love is destiny
Baby, baby

[Breakdown]
What you, what you're feeling
Let me know it immediately
And surely, surely I will
Understand you (more and more)
I'm beginning to get confused (more and more)
It's, it's suffocating (more and more)
Come on here

[Chorus]
I need you
I want you
I've got to have you

[Outro]
It's infatuation
You're my love, frustration
You're my love, frustration
You're my love, frustration
You're my love, frustration
